## Oil demand
Standard demand equation:

$$c_t = \mu + \theta_1 y_t + \theta_2 y_t^2 + \theta_3 p_t + \phi' X_t + \varepsilon_t 
$$ [@baffes2022role]


Oil prices tend to change based on certain factors.[^1]   

[^1]: See Baffes (2007) [@baffes2007oil] for more details.
